arts.ttl: Ghana's Afcon 2025 bid over as four more sides qualify
arts.sum: Ghana's hopes of reaching the 2025 Africa Cup of Nations are over as Comoros, Mali, Zambia and Zimbabwe qualify with one round of group matches to spare.

arts.ttl: Ghana fails to qualify for Africa Cup for the first time since 2004
arts.sum: The Black Stars needed a win in their penultimate group game to keep alive their slim hopes of qualifying for the tournament in Morocco next year. Ghana failed to reach the Africa Cup of Nations for the first time since 2004 after drawing with Angola 1-1 in qualifying on Friday.
Ghana's new 2024-25 home and away jerseys were released today, as part of Puma's new African Nations collection.

arts.ttl: AFCON kit drop: Rating Puma's Egypt, Ghana, Ivory Coast, Morocco, Senegal jerseys
arts.sum: Puma have gone early with the first batch of brand-new home and away kits for AFCON 2025. ESPN breaks down the best (and worst) of the lot.

arts.ttl: Nigeria one of five Afcon 2025 qualifiers as Ghana given hope
arts.sum: Nigeria head five qualifiers for the 2025 Africa Cup of Nations on Thursday, as Ghana are given a lifeline in their bid to reach Morocco.

arts.ttl: Preview: Angola vs. Ghana - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Friday's Africa Cup of Nations Qualifying clash between Angola and Ghana, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
